collectionMetadata.name: Industrial Arbitration Court Awards by Type of Worker Covered
collectionMetadata.description:
Categories of Employees covered by Award

An Industrial Arbitration Court (IAC) Award refers to an award made by the IAC, and includes a collective agreement and a memorandum of the terms which have been certified by the President of the IAC in accordance with the provision of the Industrial Relations Act.

datasetMetadata.name: Industrial Arbitration Court Awards by Type of Workers
datasetMetadata.description: In 2013, there was a re-categorization of categories for the type of workers covered. 'Professionals, Managers, Executives & Technicians' was broken down to 2 new categories- 'Professionals, Managers & Executives' and 'Associate Professionals & Technicians'. 'Production & Transport Operators, Cleaners & Labourers' was replaced by a new category 'Production, Transport & Manual Workers'. In addition, a new category, 'Maritime Officers & Seaman' was created and tracked from 2013.

datasetMetadata.name: Total Industrial Arbitration Court Awards by Type of Worker
